title: Contrition
description: Contrition is a knowledgeable story about a dominant Master who has two subs. Both of them are devoted to him, and Gwendolyn Morgan, a bright new talent on the scene, depicts in intimate detail how he manipulates them, exploiting their rivalry and using it to utterly dominate the newer submissive, Carrie.Contrition is a very well-written tale of sex and submission - by a girl who knows!
author: Gwendolyn Morgan
